headline: Jim Cramer Says “I Don’t Want You to Get Married to lululemon”
summary: lululemon athletica inc. (NASDAQ:LULU) is one of the stocks Jim Cramer shared insights on. headline: DTC Strength vs. Weak In-Store Traffic: lululemon's Balancing Act
summary: LULU's direct-to-consumer growth is powering the brand forward as in-store traffic slows in a softer North American market.

headline: lululemon: A Quality Compounder Trading At Discounted Multiples
summary: lululemon is a company well-positioned to enjoy long-term compounding effects thanks to its ample growth opportunities and robust business model. Learn more on LULU stock here.
